JS_BEGINNER_DESC: Mụta JavaScript site na ntọala ruo ọkwa dị elu — nwayọ nwayọ, tinyere ihe mgbatị ụtọ!
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Nkuzi Isi JavaScript
JavaScript bụ asụsụ mmemme e ji eme ka kọmputa na-arụ ọrụ anyị chọrọ.

1. Ederede Nzuzọ (Comments) Ị chọọ ka kọmputa hapụ otu ahịrị, jiri //. 
// Comment na-amalite na //
// Kọmputa anaghị arụ ọrụ ihe ọ bụla malitere na //
// Nke a bụ naanị ka ị kọwaa ihe koodu gị na-eme

2. Igosi Okwu ma ọ bụ Nọmba Iji mee ka kọmputa gosi okwu, jiri console.log():
console.log("Welcome")
Iji gosi nọmba:
console.log(100)

3. Variables Iji chekwaa okwu ma ọ bụ nọmba, jiri let:
let name = "Ali";
let age = 20;

4. Functions Function a na-agbakwunye nọmba abụọ:
function add(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
Iji kpọọ function ahụ:
let result = add(x, y);

5. Condition Statements Ihe atụ eji if na else:
let a = 20;
let b = 2;

if (a > b) {
   console.log("a ka ukwuu karịa b")
} else {
    console.log("a pere mpe karịa b")
}

6. Arrays Iji chekwaa ọtụtụ ihe ọnụ, jiri array:
let myeggs = [];
Na uru mbụ:
let ages = [10, 22];
let shelf = ["akwụkwọ", "fruit", "bottle"];
Ịnweta uru:
console.log(ages[1]); // 10
console.log(shelf[2]); // bottle
Length property:
console.log(myeggs.length);
console.log(shelf.length);

7. Loops Iji mee otu ihe ugboro ugboro, jiri for...of loop:
for (let drawer of shelf) {
    console.log(drawer);
}

JavaScript bụ asụsụ na-etolite mgbe niile, ma juputara na atụmatụ ị ga-amụta n’ime nkuzi na-abịa.
N’ime nkuzi a, ị mụtara ihe JavaScript bụ na ntụziaka zuru oke banyere ya.
